33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar narrated that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) stood on the Minbar and said:"The land of Fitan is there" and he pointed to the east, meaning: "Where the sun rises from the horn of Shaitan" or he said: "The horn of the sun

chapter.eng-name: Doing Deeds During Fitan, The Land Of Fitan, And The Signs of Fitan
